newsitem.title: USA: Motorola Inc Q1 net, revenues lower.
newsitem.headline: Motorola Inc Q1 net, revenues lower.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: Motorola said Q1 1997 results include the favorable settlement of certain patent claims, as well as a gain on the sale of an investment, although these items accounted for less than 10 percent of the pre-tax profits.
Motorola said Q1 1997 net margin on sales was 4.9 percent versus 5.5 percent in Q1 1996.
Primary earnings per share were the same as fully diluted for Q1 1997 and Q1 1996.
